From English classes to commercial implementation, from Baidu Miaoda, MiniMax Agent, to Byte TRAE, Alibaba Qoder, all the open mic guests demonstrated the infinite possibilities of Vibe Coding—everyone can easily create their own AI tools, super simple! 从英语课堂到商业化落地，从百度秒哒、MiniMax Agent，再到字节 TRAE、阿里 Qoder，各位开放麦嘉宾都向大家展示了 Vibe Coding 的无限可能性——人人都能手搓出专属于自己的 AI 工具，超简单！

We look forward to seeing you again next time and making AI even simpler! 我们期待下次和大家再见面，把 AI 变得更简单！

item.title: 曝基于 Gemini 的新一代 AI Siri 下月首次亮相
item.guid: 曝基于-Gemini-的新一代-AI-Siri-下月首次亮相
item.description:
According to Bloomberg, the next generation of Siri, deeply powered by Google Gemini technology, will debut as early as next month on the iOS 26.4 beta, while also restructuring the AI experience of multiple core applications. 据彭博社报道，由 Google Gemini 技术深度驱动的新一代 Siri 最快下个月开始在 iOS 26.4 测试版上亮相，同时重构多项核心应用的 AI 体验。

Bloomberg reporter Mark Gurman pointed out yesterday in his "Power On" column that Apple began contacting multiple model providers in mid-2025, including Anthropic and OpenAI, but the former's quote was too high, and the latter had strategic conflicts due to actively poaching Apple engineers and its hardware layout. 彭博社记者马克・古尔曼昨天在《Power On》专栏中指出，苹果在 2025 年中期已开始与多家模型供应商接触，包括 Anthropic 与 OpenAI，但前者报价过高，后者则因积极挖角苹果工程师及硬件布局而存在战略冲突。

Ultimately, Apple chose Gemini, partly because a US court ruled in September last year that Apple and Google's search partnership did not need to be split, clearing the way for further cooperation between the two parties. 最终，苹果选择 Gemini，部分原因还包括去年 9 月美国法院裁定无需拆分苹果与 Google 的搜索合作关系，为双方进一步合作扫清障碍。

Regarding specific timelines, Gurman believes that the first batch of Gemini-powered Siri features will enter beta testing with iOS 26.4 next month, with an official rollout planned between March and April this year. 具体时间点方面，古尔曼认为，首批由 Gemini 支持的 Siri 功能将随 iOS 26.4 在下月进入测试阶段，并计划于今年 3 月至 4 月间正式推送。

This version of Siri will run on Apple's Private Cloud Compute servers, internally codenamed Apple Foundation Models version 10, with a scale of approximately 1.2 trillion parameters. 该版本 Siri 将运行在苹果的 Private Cloud Compute 服务器上，内部代号为 Apple Foundation Models version 10，规模约为 1.2 万亿参数。

More significant upgrades will debut at WWDC this year. Apple is developing a new Siri architecture codenamed "Campos," which will be introduced in iOS 27, iPadOS 27, and macOS 27, featuring stronger contextual understanding, continuous conversation capabilities, and deep integration into core applications such as Safari, TV, Health, Music, and Podcasts. 更大幅度的升级将在今年 WWDC 亮相。苹果正开发代号「Campos」的全新 Siri 架构，将在 iOS 27、iPadOS 27 与 macOS 27 中推出，具备更强的上下文理解、持续对话能力，并深度整合至 Safari、TV、Health、Music、播客等核心应用。

At the same time, Apple's internal AI organization is also undergoing major adjustments. With the departure of John Giannandrea, former Senior Vice President of Machine Learning and AI Strategy, software engineering head Craig Federighi has taken over the AI direction and is pushing for cooperation with Google. 与此同时，苹果内部的 AI 组织也在经历重大调整。随着原机器学习与人工智能战略高级副总裁约翰・吉安南德雷亚离职，软件工程负责人克雷格・费德里吉接管 AI 方向，并推动与 Google 的合作落地。

Some original projects, such as "global knowledge Q&A" based on internal models and the AI version of Safari upgrade plan, have been scaled back or paused, but may still be restarted before WWDC. 部分原有项目，如基于内部模型的「全球知识问答」与 AI 版 Safari 升级计划已被缩减或暂停，但仍可能在 WWDC 前重启。

The report also mentioned that Apple is discussing running future versions of Siri directly on Google's cloud TPUs to improve performance and response speed. At the same time, Apple is still developing higher-performance self-developed servers to support its long-term cloud AI strategy. 报道还提到，苹果正讨论让未来版本的 Siri 直接运行在 Google 云端的 TPU 上，以提升性能与响应速度。同时，苹果仍在开发更高性能的自研服务器，以支持长期的云端 AI 布局。

Since Apple launched Apple Intelligence last year, the newly added AI features have been relatively limited, with only a few updates released in applications such as Apple Music and Apple Watch. 苹果自去年推出 Apple Intelligence 以来，新增的 AI 功能相对有限，仅在 Apple Music 与 Apple Watch 等应用中上线少量更新。

With internal model research and development encountering obstacles, talent loss intensifying, and Siri's long-delayed upgrade plan failing to materialize, Apple re-evaluated its AI roadmap in the second half of last year and ultimately decided to cooperate with Google, integrating Gemini into the underlying architecture of Siri and Apple Intelligence. 随着内部模型研发受阻、人才流失加剧，以及 Siri 延宕多时的升级计划迟迟未能落地，苹果在去年下半年重新评估其 AI 路线，并最终决定与 Google 达成合作，将 Gemini 引入 Siri 与 Apple Intelligence 的底层架构。

As the new generation of Siri is about to debut, Apple is trying to narrow the gap with products like ChatGPT and Gemini in the generative AI competition. 随着新一代 Siri 即将亮相，苹果正试图在生成式 AI 竞争中缩小与 ChatGPT、Gemini 等产品的差距。

item.title: iPhone Air 大降 2500 元，价格对标标准版
item.guid: iPhone-Air-大降-2500-元，价格对标标准版
item.description:
Apple will launch a large-scale New Year promotion, with the price reduction of the iPhone Air being particularly noteworthy. 苹果将开启规模较大的新年促销活动，其中 iPhone Air 的降价幅度尤为引人关注。

According to information from Apple's Tmall flagship store, from 20:00 on January 25th to 23:59:59 on February 11th, Apple will participate in the Tmall New Year's Shopping Festival, offering official discounts on multiple products. 根据苹果天猫旗舰店信息，自 1 月 25 日 20:00 起至 2 月 11 日 23:59:59，苹果将参与天猫年货狂欢季，推出覆盖多款产品的官方优惠。

The original price of 7999 yuan for the 256 GB iPhone Air is officially reduced by 2000 yuan, and with national subsidies, the lowest price is 5499 yuan, even putting it in the same price range as the standard iPhone 17. 原价 7999 元的 256 GB iPhone Air 官方立减 2000 元，叠加国补后到手价最低 5499 元，甚至与标准版 iPhone 17 处于同一价位段。

    Except for iPhone Air, iPhone 17 Pro / 17 Pro Max has a maximum discount of 300 yuan;

    MacBook Air has a maximum discount of 1200 yuan;

    iPad Air has a maximum discount of 1000 yuan;

    Apple Pencil and AirPods also have price reductions ranging from 100 to 300 yuan.

Apple disclosed the stock scale for this event in the announcement: approximately 200,000 iPhone 17 Pro / 17 Pro Max units, 13,000 iPhone Air units, 7,300 MacBook Air (M4 chip) units, 20,000 iPad Air units, and 6,000 iPad mini units, etc. Stock is limited and available while supplies last. 苹果在公告中披露了此次活动的备货规模：约 20 万台 iPhone 17 Pro / 17 Pro Max、1.3 万台 iPhone Air、7300 台 MacBook Air（M4 芯片）、2 万台 iPad Air 以及 6000 台 iPad mini 等，库存有限，售完即止。

The iPhone Air officially went on sale on October 22 last year, just three months ago. It features an eSIM design, weighs 165 grams, and is 5.6 millimeters thick, making it Apple's thinnest iPhone to date. iPhone Air 于去年 10 月 22 日正式开售，距今仅三个月。其采用 eSIM 设计、重量 165 克、厚度 5.6 毫米，是苹果目前最薄的 iPhone。

Due to the incomplete support for eSIM by domestic carriers previously, this model was not able to enter the Chinese market immediately. According to Jiemian News, with channel prices continuously falling after its launch, coupled with trade-in subsidies, the actual price on third-party platforms once dropped to about 5099 yuan, a cumulative reduction of about 2900 yuan compared to the official price. 由于此前国内运营商未全面支持 eSIM，该机型未能在第一时间进入中国市场。据界面新闻消息，随着上市后渠道价格持续下探，叠加以旧换新补贴，第三方平台到手价一度降至约 5099 元，较官方价累计下调约 2900 元。

It is worth noting that this is Apple's third large-scale promotion in over a month. 值得注意的是，这是苹果一个多月内第三次大规模促销。

Just on January 22, Apple's official Chinese website launched a limited-time New Year offer, covering multiple products such as iPhone, Mac, iPad, and Apple Watch, with savings of up to 1000 yuan, but the iPhone 17 series was not included in the promotion. In December last year, Apple also offered a limited-time price reduction for the iPhone 17 Pro series. 就在 1 月 22 日，苹果中国官网已上线新春限时优惠，覆盖 iPhone、Mac、iPad、Apple Watch 等多款产品，最高立省 1000 元，但 iPhone 17 系列未包含在活动范围内。去年 12 月，苹果也曾对 iPhone 17 Pro 系列进行限时降价。

In addition, Apple updated its trade-in values on January 16, covering multiple Android models from Huawei, Xiaomi, and others. Among them, the iPhone 16 Pro Max can be traded in for up to 5800 yuan in China, and the iPhone 15 Pro Max for up to 4300 yuan. 此外，苹果在 1 月 16 日更新了以旧换新折抵价，覆盖华为、小米等多款安卓机型。其中 iPhone 16 Pro Max 中国区最高可抵 5800 元，iPhone 15 Pro Max 最高可抵 4300 元。

Apple is expected to announce its Q1 2026 fiscal year results on January 29 local time, at which point the public will be able to see the sales performance of new phones released in September last year. 苹果预计将在当地时间 1 月 29 日公布 2026 财年第一财季业绩，届时外界将能看到去年 9 月发布的新机销售表现。

item.title: 报道称三星电子将一季度 NAND 价格上调 100%
item.guid: 报道称三星电子将一季度-NAND-价格上调-100%
item.description:
According to Korean media etnews, Samsung Electronics has increased NAND flash memory supply prices by over 100% in the first quarter of this year, a hike far exceeding previous market expectations. This round of price adjustments officially took effect in January this year, and the upward trend is expected to continue into the second quarter. 据韩媒 etnews 报道，今年一季度三星电子已将 NAND 闪存供应价格上调 100% 以上，涨幅远超市场此前预期。此轮调价从今年 1 月起正式执行，且涨价趋势预计将在二季度继续延续。

Samsung Electronics completed a new round of supply contract negotiations with major customers at the end of last year and has been supplying at the increased prices since January this year. Previously, DRAM contract prices had increased by up to nearly 70%, and the increase for NAND has further expanded, highlighting the intensifying supply-demand imbalance in the memory chip market. 三星电子在去年年底已完成与主要客户的新一轮供应合同谈判，并自今年 1 月起按上调后的价格供货。此前 DRAM 合同价格最高已上调近 70%，而 NAND 的涨幅进一步扩大，凸显存储芯片市场供需失衡加剧。

Price increases are not exclusive to Samsung. The report cited sources and analysts saying that SK Hynix, the world's second-largest NAND manufacturer, has seen similar increases to Samsung; overseas brokerages also expect SanDisk, the world's fifth-largest NAND manufacturer, to raise NAND prices by about 100% this year, indicating that price increases have become a widespread industry trend. 涨价并非三星独有行为。报道援引消息人士和分析师称，全球第二大 NAND 厂商海力士涨幅与三星相近；海外券商亦预计全球第五大 NAND 厂商闪迪将在今年将 NAND 价格上调约 100%，涨价已成为行业普遍趋势。

The report believes that the core reason for the price increase lies in the rapid expansion of demand and limited supply growth . 报道认为， 涨价的核心原因在于需求快速扩张而供给增长有限 。

On the one hand, the construction of AI infrastructure has led to a significant increase in demand for enterprise-grade eSSD; on the other hand, smartphones and PCs are accelerating the adoption of high-performance, large-capacity storage solutions, and the popularization of edge AI further boosts NAND demand. 一方面，AI 基础设施建设带动企业级 eSSD 需求显著增长；另一方面，智能手机与 PC 加速采用高性能、大容量存储方案，端侧 AI 的普及进一步推高 NAND 需求。

On the supply side, growth has been slow due to factors such as the absence of large-scale capacity expansion last year and restricted process conversion pace. It is generally believed in the industry that although Samsung has not significantly reduced production, overall shipment expansion remains limited. 供给端则因去年未出现大规模扩产、制程转换节奏受限等因素而增长缓慢。业内普遍认为，尽管三星未大幅减产，但整体出货扩张仍受到限制。

According to data from market research firm TrendForce, NAND prices rose by approximately 33% to 38% quarter-on-quarter in the fourth quarter of last year, and the actual increase in the first quarter of this year has significantly exceeded previous expectations. 市场调研机构 TrendForce 集邦咨询数据显示，去年第四季度 NAND 价格环比上涨约 33%～38%，而今年一季度实际涨幅已明显超出此前预期。

The report also pointed out that Samsung has begun negotiations with customers regarding a new round of price increases. As DRAM and NAND prices continue to rise, the cost of building AI data centers has significantly increased, leading to an industry judgment that "the bottleneck for AI popularization lies in memory." 报道还指出，三星已与客户就新一轮涨价展开协商。随着 DRAM 与 NAND 价格持续走高，AI 数据中心建设成本显著上升，甚至出现「AI 普及的瓶颈在于存储器」的行业判断。

At the same time, consumer-grade terminal products such as smartphones and PCs may also face price increase pressure due to rising storage costs. 同时，智能手机与 PC 等消费级终端产品也可能因存储成本上升而面临涨价压力。

item.title: 追觅员工南极行成行，俞浩：不是蹭热度，提前半年规划
item.guid: 追觅员工南极行成行，俞浩：不是蹭热度，提前半年规划
item.description:
Dreametech founder Yu Hao announced yesterday on Weibo that the company's previously promised trip to Antarctica for outstanding employees has officially materialized, with ten employees successfully arriving in Antarctica and continuing their journey towards the South Pole. 追觅创始人俞浩昨日在微博宣布，公司此前承诺的优秀员工南极行已正式落地，十名员工已顺利抵达南极，并将继续向南极极点进发。

Yu Hao stated that Antarctica was chosen as the reward destination because 'we want to go to the farthest place.' He emphasized that this trip is not 'riding on a trend' as outsiders suggest; Antarctic travel, especially to the South Pole, requires at least six months of preparation, and the company had already started planning long ago. 俞浩表示，选择南极作为奖励目的地，是因为「要去最远的地方」。他强调，此行并非外界所说的「蹭热度」，南极旅行尤其是前往南极极点，需要至少提前半年筹备，公司早已开始规划。

A month ago, Yu Hao publicly announced that he would send ten outstanding employees to Antarctica, which sparked some skepticism at the time. In his latest post, he responded that most of the negative comments were 'fabricated, exaggerated, or generalized.' He emphasized that if the company truly treated its employees poorly, 'employees have legs' and would not choose to stay. 一个月前，俞浩曾公开表示将送十名优秀员工前往南极，当时引发部分质疑。他在最新发文中回应称，相关负面评价多为「无中生有、添油加醋或以偏概全」。他强调，若公司真的对员工不好，「员工都是有腿的」，不会选择留下。

In addition to the Antarctic trip, Yu Hao also revealed that this year's Dreametech annual meeting will be directly replaced with 'inviting everyone to a concert,' hoping to interact with employees in a more innovative way. He stated that within its capabilities, the company has always made its best efforts to treat employees with care. 除南极行外，俞浩还透露，今年追觅年会将直接改为「请大家看演唱会」，希望以更具新意的方式与员工互动。他表示，在能力范围内，公司一直尽最大努力用心对待员工。

The day before, Yu Hao posted on Weibo saying he wanted to customize 10,000 Dreametech eggs for a lottery. 而在前一天，俞浩在微博发文称，想定制 10000 个追觅鸡蛋来抽奖。

He further emphasized: 'When I become the world's richest person in a few years, you are not allowed to laugh at me and my silly eggs.' 他还进一步强调：「等过几年我当上世界首富了，你们不许嘲笑我和我的笨鸡蛋。」

item.title: 黄仁勋现身上海菜市场「逛吃」引大量围观
item.guid: 黄仁勋现身上海菜市场「逛吃」引大量围观
item.description:
According to multiple media reports including Reuters, National Business Daily, and Shanghai Observer, NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang quietly arrived in Shanghai on January 24, commencing his annual routine visit to China. 据路透社、《每日经济新闻》、上观新闻等多家媒体报道，1 月 24 日，英伟达 CEO 黄仁勋低调抵达上海，开启其年度例行访华行程。

As in previous years, he will travel to Shanghai, Beijing, and Shenzhen to attend company New Year's Eve parties and supplier-related events, and communicate business progress with the Chinese team at key junctures. 与往年相同，他此行将先后前往上海、北京与深圳，参加公司新年晚会及供应商相关活动，并在关键时间节点与中国团队沟通业务进展。

Upon arriving in Shanghai, Jensen Huang appeared at the Jinde Wet Market on Rushan Road in Lujiazui Street, attracting a large number of netizens. 抵达上海后，黄仁勋现身陆家嘴街道乳山路锦德菜市场，引发大量网友围观。

From the scene footage, he was seen wearing black clothing and a locally popular 'bureau-level jacket,' walking and eating among the stalls, interacting and taking photos with citizens, described by netizens as 'food never leaving his hand.' A fruit stall owner claimed he also received a signed red envelope. 从现场画面来看，他身着黑色服装、换上当地流行的「司局级夹克」，在摊位间边走边吃，与市民合影互动，被网友形容为「食物不离手」。一水果摊老板称，他还收到一个签名红包。

According to the World Economic Forum, during the Davos Forum, Jensen Huang also discussed global trends in AI infrastructure, stating that AI is at a 'platform-level turning point' similar to the internet and mobile eras, and called on countries to build localized AI infrastructure. 另据世界经济论坛消息，在达沃斯论坛期间，黄仁勋也谈及 AI 基建的全球趋势，认为 AI 正处于类似互联网与移动时代的「平台级转折点」，并呼吁各国构建本土化 AI 基础设施。

He emphasized that the popularization of AI will bring large-scale industrial investment and employment opportunities, with significant efficiency improvements already seen, especially in manufacturing and healthcare. 他强调，AI 的普及将带来大规模产业投资与就业机会，尤其在制造业与医疗等领域已出现显著效率提升。

item.title: 男子「SIM 卡炼金」引热议，当事人澄清：原料来自电子镀金废料
item.guid: 男子「SIM-卡炼金」引热议，当事人澄清：原料来自电子镀金废料
item.description:
According to Jimu News, the topic 'Man extracts 191.73 grams of gold from SIM cards' recently topped trending searches, sparking widespread discussion. Calculated at this year's gold price of 1120 yuan/gram, this weight corresponds to a value of approximately 214,700 yuan. 据极目新闻报道，近日「男子用 SIM 卡炼出 191.73 克黄金」的话题登上热搜，引发广泛讨论。按照今年黄金价格 1120 元/克计算，该重量对应的价值约为 21.47 万元。

The person involved stated in an interview that there is a clear misunderstanding in the online narrative. 当事人在接受采访时表示，网络传播的说法存在明显误解。

He emphasized that the video indeed records a real process in the precious metal recycling industry, but the raw material does not come from 'a single, complete ordinary SIM card,' but rather a collection of gold-plated waste from various chips in the communication electronics field. 他强调，视频记录的确实是贵金属回收行业的真实工艺流程，但原料并非来自「单一、完整的普通 SIM 卡」，而是通信电子领域中多类芯片镀金废料的集合。

He pointed out that the '191.73 grams' circulating online is the weighing data of a certain batch of finished products, which was simplified to 'extracting gold from SIM cards' during dissemination. This statement is not rigorous and can easily mislead the public. 他指出，网络流传的「191.73 克」为某一批次成品的称重数据，在传播过程中被简化为「用 SIM 卡炼金」，这一表述并不严谨，也容易误导公众。

The blogger further explained that precious metal recycling in the industry is usually processed in units of kilogram-level waste, and 'the raw material weight at that time was close to 2 tons.' Ordinary SIM cards, due to their limited quantity and extremely low gold content, have almost no feasible extraction value for individuals. 该博主进一步解释，行业内的贵金属回收通常以公斤级废料为单位处理，「当时的原料重量接近 2 吨」，而普通人日常接触的 SIM 卡因数量有限、含金量极低，几乎不具备可行的提炼价值。

According to City Channel, the gold content of SIM card chips is usually only about 0.02 grams or even less, and the extraction process requires the use of strong corrosive chemical reagents, posing significant safety risks and environmental pollution hazards. Therefore, individual extraction attempts are not recommended. 另据都市频道报道，SIM 卡芯片的含金量通常仅约 0.02 克甚至更低，且提取过程需使用强腐蚀性化学试剂，存在较大安全风险与环境污染隐患，因此不建议个人尝试提取。

item.title: 苹果 Siri「偷听」集体诉讼和解，一共赔 9500 万美元
item.guid: 苹果-Siri「偷听」集体诉讼和解，一共赔-9500-万美元
item.description:
According to 9to5Mac, Apple has paid out $95 million in settlement funds to eligible users in a class-action lawsuit over the Siri 'unintended recording' controversy. 据 9to5Mac 报道，苹果已就 Siri「非预期录音」争议的集体诉讼向符合条件的用户发放 9500 万美元和解金。

It is understood that this lawsuit dates back to 2019. At that time, The Guardian revealed that Apple's outsourced contractors had heard users' private conversations during the Siri quality control process, raising privacy concerns. 据悉，这起诉讼可追溯至 2019 年。当时英国《卫报》披露，苹果外包承包商在 Siri 质检流程中曾听到用户的私人对话，引发隐私担忧。

Apple subsequently emphasized that less than 1% of Siri interactions are used for quality inspection, and recordings are not linked to user Apple accounts or used for marketing; at the same time, the company has required users to actively choose whether to participate in Siri recording quality inspection and to withdraw relevant permissions. 苹果随后强调，只有不足 1% 的 Siri 互动会用于质检，且录音不会与用户 Apple 账号关联，也不会用于营销；同时公司已要求用户主动选择是否参与 Siri 录音质检，并撤回相关权限。

According to the settlement terms, eligible users must have purchased a Siri-enabled device between September 17, 2014, and December 31, 2024, and experienced "unintended Siri activation." 根据和解条款，符合条件的用户需在 2014 年 9 月 17 日至 2024 年 12 月 31 日期间购买过支持 Siri 的设备，并经历过「非预期 Siri 激活」。

Individuals can claim for a maximum of 5 devices. The previously estimated compensation was up to $20 per device, with a personal cap of $100, but the final amount is approximately $8.02 per device, with a personal cap of $40.10. 个人最多可申报 5 台设备。此前估算的赔付金额为每台设备最高 20 美元、个人上限 100 美元，但最终金额约为每台 8.02 美元、个人上限 40.10 美元。

The report points out that users who chose direct bank transfer have already started receiving payments yesterday; if choosing a prepaid card or check, they should check their email spam folder or physical mailbox. 报道指出，选择直接银行转账的用户已于昨天陆续收到款项；若选择预付卡或支票，则需留意邮箱垃圾邮件夹或实体信箱。

item.title: 黑石拟出售徕卡控股权，估值达 10 亿欧元
item.guid: 黑石拟出售徕卡控股权，估值达-10-亿欧元
item.description:
According to Bloomberg, Blackstone is in early discussions with the Kaufmann family, co-shareholders of Leica Camera AG, regarding the sale of a controlling stake in the company, with a potential transaction valuation of approximately 1 billion euros. 据彭博社报道，黑石集团正与徕卡相机（Leica Camera AG）共同股东考夫曼家族就出售公司控股权进行早期讨论，潜在交易估值约为 10 亿欧元。

Since last year, Blackstone began evaluating its long-term holding strategy in Leica. 自去年起，黑石开始评估其在徕卡的长期持股策略。

Public information shows that Blackstone acquired approximately 45% of Leica's shares in 2011 and has driven the brand's transformation from a traditional camera manufacturer to a high-end luxury brand over the past decade. The Kaufmann family, as another major shareholder, also participated in these sale discussions and may reinvest after the transaction is completed. 公开信息显示，黑石于 2011 年收购徕卡约 45% 股份，并在过去十余年推动品牌从传统相机制造商向高端奢侈品牌转型。考夫曼家族作为另一主要股东，也参与了此次出售讨论，并可能在交易完成后重新投资。

Currently, potential buyers include HSG (formerly Sequoia Capital China) and private equity firm Altor Equity Partners, among others. The relevant negotiations are still in the early stages, and it is not yet confirmed whether a deal will ultimately be reached. All parties declined to comment on the matter. 目前，潜在买方包括 HSG（前身为红杉资本中国）及私募机构 Altor Equity Partners 等，相关洽谈仍处于初期阶段，尚无法确认交易最终能否达成。多方均拒绝就此置评。

The report cited data indicating that Leica achieved revenue of approximately 596 million euros in the fiscal year ending last March, a year-on-year increase of 7.6%. This growth primarily came from its core imaging business and mobile device collaborations, with its partnership with Xiaomi being considered one of the key drivers . 报道援引数据指出，徕卡在截至去年 3 月的财年中实现营收约 5.96 亿欧元，同比增长 7.6%，增长主要来自核心影像业务及移动设备合作， 其中与小米的合作被视为重要驱动力之一 。

It is worth noting that rumors of Leica being sold are not new. 值得注意的是，徕卡被出售的传闻并非首次出现。

As early as 2017, similar news emerged, with a valuation of approximately 700 million euros at the time; this time, the valuation has increased to 1 billion euros. 早在 2017 年，市场上就曾出现类似消息，当时估值约为 7 亿欧元，此次估值提升至 10 亿欧元。

item.title: Gmail 出现邮件分类故障，Google 称正加紧修复
item.guid: Gmail-出现邮件分类故障，Google-称正加紧修复
item.description:
According to Engadget, Google recently confirmed an anomaly in its Gmail automatic filtering system, leading to a flood of spam and advertising emails in many users' inboxes, accompanied by additional spam warning notifications. 据 Engadget 报道，近日，Google 确认 Gmail 自动过滤系统出现异常，导致大量用户收件箱被垃圾邮件与广告邮件淹没，并伴随额外的垃圾邮件警告提示。

The problem became concentrated last weekend, and Google stated in its response that the issue causes "inbox emails to be misclassified and additional spam warnings to appear," emphasizing that the team is actively working on a fix. The company also reminded users to remain vigilant when handling emails from unknown senders. 问题自上周末开始集中显现，Google 在回应中表示，问题会导致「收件箱邮件被错误分类，并出现额外垃圾邮件警告」，并强调团队正积极修复。公司同时提醒用户在处理来自未知发件人的邮件时保持警惕。

The report points out that Gmail originally relies on an automatic filtering mechanism to divert spam, advertising emails, and unimportant emails from the main inbox to keep the interface tidy. 报道指出，Gmail 原本依靠自动过滤机制，将垃圾邮件、广告邮件及不重要邮件从主收件箱分流，以保持界面整洁。

However, this glitch caused some emails to bypass spam scanning and go directly into the main inbox, even displaying a "Please be careful with this email" banner. In addition, many users reported delayed email reception, with some two-factor authentication (2FA) codes not arriving in time, affecting the normal login process for applications and websites. 然而，此次故障导致部分邮件未经过垃圾邮件扫描便直接进入主收件箱，甚至出现「请谨慎对待此邮件」横幅提示。此外，不少用户反馈邮件接收延迟，部分双重验证码（2FA）无法及时送达，影响应用与网站的正常登录流程。

item.title: 银河通用成为 2026 春晚指定具身大模型机器人
item.guid: 银河通用成为-2026-春晚指定具身大模型机器人
item.description:
Yesterday, China Media Group and Galaxy Universal Robotics jointly announced that Galaxy Universal Robotics has become the designated embodied large model robot for the 2026 Spring Festival Gala. 昨天，中央广播电视总台和银河通用机器人共同宣布，银河通用机器人成为 2026 年春节联欢晚会指定具身大模型机器人。

Galaxy Universal Robotics stated that the company has long focused on the research and development of embodied large models and humanoid robots, having formed a "robot service ecosystem" covering multiple industries such as retail, industrial, medical, and cultural tourism. 银河通用机器人表示，公司长期聚焦具身大模型与人形机器人研发，已形成覆盖零售、工业、医疗、文旅等多行业的「机器人服务生态」。

Through its self-developed embodied large model system and highly reliable humanoid robot body, the company demonstrates autonomous decision-making, generalization capabilities, and anti-interference performance in complex scenarios, providing a scalable technical path for human-robot collaboration. 公司通过自研具身大模型体系与高可靠人形机器人本体，在复杂场景中展现出自主决策、泛化能力与抗干扰性能，为人机协作提供可规模化落地的技术路径。

Recently, Galaxy Universal completed $300 million in financing, with its valuation exceeding $3 billion, continuing to rank among the top embodied AI enterprises in China. The company stated that it will leverage the Spring Festival Gala, a national-level stage, to showcase the cutting-edge achievements of embodied intelligence and present the real value of technological innovation with a more engaging interactive experience. 近期，银河通用完成 3 亿美元融资，估值突破 30 亿美元，继续位列国内具身智能企业前列。公司表示，将借助春晚这一国家级舞台展示具身智能的前沿成果，并以更具温度的交互体验呈现科技创新的现实价值。

As the Spring Festival approaches, Galaxy Universal's humanoid robots have appeared in various forms in retail, cultural tourism, and other scenarios, from space capsule coffee services to local characteristic dance performances, becoming an important part of this year's "tech-infused New Year flavor." 随着春节临近，银河通用的人形机器人已在零售、文旅等场景以多种形式亮相，从太空舱咖啡服务到地方特色舞蹈表演，成为今年「科技年味」的重要组成部分。

item.title: 日本调查：超一成漫画家与插画师因生成式 AI 收入下滑
item.guid: 日本调查：超一成漫画家与插画师因生成式-AI-收入下滑
item.description:
According to The Japan Times, a large-scale survey recently released by the Japan Freelance Union shows that over 1/10 of Japanese manga artists, illustrators, and other creative professionals experienced varying degrees of income decline in the past year due to the popularization of generative AI, leading to a significant increase in the industry's demand for regulation and copyright transparency. 据《日本时报》报道，日本自由职业者联盟近日发布的一份大规模调查显示，过去一年中，超 1/10 的日本漫画家、插画师及其他创意从业者因生成式 AI 的普及出现不同程度的收入下滑，行业对监管与版权透明度的诉求显著升高。

The survey was launched in October last year, collecting 24,991 valid questionnaires, with illustrators accounting for 54.2% and manga artists for 15%. 调查于去年 10 月启动，共回收 24991 份有效问卷，其中插画师占比 54.2%，漫画家占比 15%。

Overall, 12% of respondents explicitly stated that their income decline was directly related to generative AI, with 9.3% experiencing a decrease of 10%-50%, and another 2.7% seeing their income shrink by over 50%. 整体来看，有 12% 的受访者明确表示收入下降与生成式 AI 直接相关，其中 9.3% 的降幅在 10%-50% 之间，另有 2.7% 的创作者收入缩水超过 50%。

Multiple media reports indicate that some clients, even at the inquiry stage, assume creators will use AI, leading them to propose shorter delivery times and lower fees, or even directly use AI-generated content, resulting in fewer orders for traditional creators. 多家媒体报道均指出，部分客户在询价阶段便默认创作者会使用 AI，从而提出更短交付周期与更低费用，甚至直接采用 AI 生成内容，导致传统创作者订单减少。

The survey also shows that industry concerns about generative AI are highly consistent: 调查还显示，行业对生成式 AI 的担忧已高度一致：

    88.6% of respondents believe that generative AI poses a threat to their livelihood, with 65.3% stating the threat is "very strong";

    Regarding usage attitudes, 62.9% of creators stated they would not use generative AI now or in the future;

    21.4% use it for brainstorming;

    9.3% use it for repetitive tasks;

    2.8% use AI to complete part or all of their work.

In addition to income pressure, copyright and reputational risks have also become prominent issues. 77.8% of respondents reported witnessing colleagues being slandered or cyberattacked due to suspicions of AI use or their work being accused of resembling AI-generated content, while 14.5% personally experienced similar situations. 除收入压力外，版权与名誉风险亦成为突出问题。77.8% 的受访者表示见过同行因被怀疑使用 AI 或作品被指与 AI 生成内容相似而遭遇诽谤或网络攻击，14.5% 的人亲身经历过类似情况。

One interviewed novelist even warned that as it becomes increasingly difficult to prove non-use of AI, creators might face "witch-hunt-style" accusations. 一位受访小说家甚至警告，随着证明未使用 AI 变得愈发困难，创作者可能面临「猎巫式」指控。

Regarding regulatory demands, the creator community is almost unanimously calling for stronger legislation: 在监管诉求方面，创作者群体几乎一致要求加强立法：

    92.8% of respondents believe that a list of copyrighted works used in AI training data should be mandatorily disclosed;

    61.6% support an "opt-in" model requiring prior permission;

    26.6% advocate for a principled ban on using copyrighted works for training.

The Japan Freelance Union calls on the government to expedite relevant legislation, including transparency of training data, a labeling system for AI-generated content, and a creator revenue distribution mechanism. 日本自由职业者联盟呼吁政府尽快推进相关立法，包括训练数据透明化、AI 生成内容标识制度以及创作者收益分配机制等。

item.title: 法律 AI 公司 Harvey 收购 Hexus 加码法律科技
item.guid: 法律-AI-公司-Harvey-收购-Hexus-加码法律科技
item.description:
According to TechCrunch, legal tech company Harvey recently acquired Hexus, a two-year-old startup, continuing to expand its footprint in the increasingly fierce legal tech competition this year. 据 TechCrunch 报道，法律科技公司 Harvey 近日收购成立两年的初创公司 Hexus，在今年愈发激烈的法律科技竞争中继续扩大版图。

Hexus primarily provides tools for generating product demos, videos, and operational guides. Its San Francisco-based team has already joined Harvey, and the India team will be integrated after Harvey establishes a Bangalore office. Hexus 主要提供产品演示、视频与操作指南生成工具，其位于旧金山的团队已加入 Harvey，印度团队将在 Harvey 设立班加罗尔办公室后并入。

Sakshi Pratap, founder and CEO of Hexus, stated that she will lead an engineering team to accelerate Harvey's product capability development for corporate legal departments. Hexus 创始人兼 CEO Sakshi Pratap 表示，她将负责带领一支工程团队，加速 Harvey 面向企业法务部门的产品能力建设 。

Pratap previously held engineering positions at Walmart, Oracle, and Google. She stated that the team's experience in enterprise AI tools will help Harvey iterate faster in a rapidly accelerating market. Pratap 曾在沃尔玛、甲骨文与 Google 任职工程岗位。她称团队在企业级 AI 工具方面的经验将帮助 Harvey 在竞争加速的市场中更快迭代。

Hexus had previously raised a total of $1.6 million in funding, with investors including Pear VC, Liquid 2 Ventures, and several angel investors. Pratap did not disclose the transaction terms, only stating that the acquisition structure was designed around "long-term team incentives." Hexus 此前共获得 160 万美元融资，投资方包括 Pear VC、Liquid 2 Ventures 及多位天使投资人。Pratap 未披露交易条款，仅表示收购结构围绕「长期团队激励」设计 。

The report points out that this acquisition occurred against the backdrop of Harvey's rapid expansion. 报道指出，此次收购发生在 Harvey 快速扩张的背景下。

Last year, Harvey completed a $760 million funding round, with the latest round led by a16z, bringing the company's valuation to $8 billion. New investors included T. Rowe Price and WndrCo, while existing shareholders Sequoia, Kleiner Perkins, Conviction, and Elad Gil continued to follow on. 去年，Harvey 完成 7.6 亿美元融资，最新一轮由 a16z 领投，使公司估值达到 80 亿美元，新投资者包括 T. Rowe Price 与 WndrCo，老股东 Sequoia、Kleiner Perkins、Conviction 与 Elad Gil 继续跟投。

At the beginning of this year, Harvey's valuation was still $3 billion, with a $300 million Series D round led by Sequoia. The company currently claims to have over 1,000 clients, covering 60 countries, including most of the top ten law firms in the United States. 今年年初，Harvey 的估值仍为 30 亿美元，由 Sequoia 领投 3 亿美元 D 轮融资。公司目前声称拥有超过 1000 家客户，覆盖 60 个国家，其中包括美国前十律所中的多数 。

Co-founder and CEO Winston Weinberg stated that he and co-founder Gabe Pereyra initially tested GPT-3 on Reddit to answer legal questions related to tenants and landlords, and had the generated content evaluated by lawyers, with 86% of the answers requiring no modification before being sent. 联合创始人兼 CEO Winston Weinberg 表示，他与联合创始人 Gabe Pereyra 最初在 Reddit 上测试 GPT-3 回答租客与房东相关法律问题，并将生成内容交由律师评估，其中 86% 的回答无需修改即可发送。

On July 4, 2022, the two sent a cold email to OpenAI CEO Sam Altman, received a reply the same day, and soon secured the first investment from the OpenAI Startup Fund. The fund remains Harvey's second-largest investor. 2022 年 7 月 4 日，两人向 OpenAI CEO Sam Altman 发送冷邮件，当天即获得回复，并很快拿到 OpenAI Startup Fund 的首笔投资。该基金目前仍是 Harvey 的第二大投资方 。

item.title: 雷蛇 CEO：我们投了 6 亿美元，但玩家还是讨厌生成式 AI
item.guid: 雷蛇-CEO：我们投了-6-亿美元，但玩家还是讨厌生成式-AI
item.description:
Razer CEO Min-Liang Tan recently discussed the gaming industry's general aversion to generative AI and responded to the company's large-scale investment in AI on The Verge's podcast "Decoder." 雷蛇 CEO 陈民亮近日在 The Verge 旗下播客节目《Decoder》中谈及游戏行业对生成式 AI 的普遍反感情绪，并回应公司在 AI 方向上的大规模投入。

He stated that Razer has invested approximately $600 million in AI technology, but players' rejection of low-quality generative content remains strong, which is the core of the current industry conflict. 他表示，雷蛇已在 AI 技术上累计投入约 6 亿美元，但玩家对低质量生成式内容的排斥依旧强烈，这也是当前行业矛盾的核心。

Tan pointed out that what players are truly dissatisfied with is "junk content produced by generative AI," including distorted character models and low-quality storylines. 陈民亮指出，玩家真正不满的是「生成式 AI 产出的垃圾内容」，包括角色模型畸形、剧情质量低下等问题。

He emphasized that Razer stands with players in opposing the mass generation of low-quality content with minimal prompts. He believes that the value of AI should be reflected in "assisting developers" rather than "replacing creation," such as improving QA testing efficiency, automatically logging bugs, and checking spelling errors, all of which can help developers refine games faster and better. 他强调，雷蛇与玩家立场一致，反对以少量提示词批量生成低质量内容。他认为 AI 的价值应体现在「辅助开发者」而非「替代创作」，例如提升 QA 测试效率、自动记录 Bug、检查拼写错误等，这些都能帮助开发者更快、更好地完善游戏。

During the program, Tan further explained Razer's AI strategy. He revealed that the company plans to hire 150 AI engineers and views AI as a long-term bet, hoping to use it to resist market hype cycles and player sentiment fluctuations. 在节目中，陈民亮进一步解释了雷蛇的 AI 战略。他透露，公司计划招聘 150 名 AI 工程师，并将 AI 视为一场长期押注，希望借此抵御市场炒作周期与玩家情绪波动。

He also emphasized that Razer's AI layout is not limited to generative content but spans hardware, software, and service ecosystems, including concept products like smart headphones Motoko and AI character Ava. 他同时强调，雷蛇的 AI 布局并非局限于生成式内容，而是贯穿硬件、软件与服务生态，包括智能耳机 Motoko、AI 角色 Ava 等概念产品。

Regarding external concerns about AI safety and emotional dependence, Tan stated that Ava is currently in the concept stage, and the company will continue to collect feedback and strengthen security mechanisms before its official launch. 对于外界关注的 AI 安全与情感依赖问题，陈民亮表示，Ava 目前仍处于概念阶段，公司会在正式推出前持续收集反馈并强化安全机制。

He stressed that Razer will not encourage users to establish emotional dependencies with AI characters, and the product's core goal remains to provide practical value and a more natural interactive experience. 他强调，雷蛇不会鼓励用户与 AI 角色建立情感依赖关系，产品的核心目标仍是提供实用价值与更自然的交互体验。

On the hardware front, he mentioned that the industry is facing pressure from rising memory and GPU costs, and Razer cannot yet determine the final pricing of future products. 在硬件层面，他提到行业正面临内存与 GPU 成本上涨的压力，雷蛇尚无法确定未来产品的最终定价。

Furthermore, he believes that AI will become an important component of future hardware, but Razer's strategy is to build a vertical ecosystem for players through open, multi-model support and self-developed context systems, rather than directly competing with model providers. 此外，他认为 AI 将成为未来硬件的重要组成部分，但雷蛇的策略是通过开放、多模型支持与自研上下文系统，构建面向玩家的垂直生态，而非与模型提供商直接竞争。

item.title: 💡 俞敏洪：AI 或消灭大量教师岗位，中小学教师「一大半是不合格的」
item.guid: 💡-俞敏洪：AI-或消灭大量教师岗位，中小学教师「一大半是不合格的」
item.description:
According to Kuai Technology, New Oriental founder Yu Minhong recently shared his latest views on the impact of the internet and artificial intelligence on the education industry at this year's Chongli Forum. 据快科技报道，新东方创始人俞敏洪近日在今年崇礼论坛上围绕互联网与人工智能对教育行业的影响发表最新观点。

He pointed out that technological change is driving education from "one mouth and one blackboard" to "Internet + Education," and then towards "AI + Education," emphasizing that this trend will profoundly change the structure of teaching positions. 他指出，技术变革正推动教育从「一张嘴一块黑板」到「互联网 + 教育」，再迈向「AI + 教育」，并强调这一趋势将深刻改变教师岗位结构。

Yu Minhong stated that the internet is still within human control, but its amplifying effect on public opinion has profoundly impacted personal lives. He mentioned that the online bullying he experienced in the past three years is closely related to the internet environment. 俞敏洪表示，互联网仍在人类可控范围内，但其带来的舆论放大效应已深刻影响个人生活。他提到，过去三年遭遇的网暴与互联网环境密切相关。

In contrast, the impact of artificial intelligence is more structural, and its applications in education, healthcare, biology, and other fields will continue to expand. 相比之下，人工智能的影响更具结构性，其在教育、医疗、生物等领域的应用将持续扩大。

In educational settings, he believes that AI can already complete nearly 100% of English communication and homework grading, which not only improves efficiency but also reduces the psychological pressure students face when dealing with teachers. He pointed out that the popularization of AI might "eliminate a large number of teaching positions" because the transmission of basic knowledge is being rapidly replaced by technology. 在教育场景中，他认为 AI 已能完成接近 100% 的英语交流与作业批改，不仅提升效率，也减轻学生面对老师时的心理压力。他指出，AI 的普及可能会「消灭大量老师岗位」，因为基础知识传递正被技术快速替代。

He further emphasized that the core value of future teachers will shift towards inspiring students' potential, shaping their character, and guiding their growth, abilities that cannot be replaced by technology. 他进一步强调，未来教师的核心价值将转向激发学生潜能、塑造人格与引导成长，这些能力无法被技术替代。

According to this standard, he bluntly stated that "more than half" of current primary and secondary school teachers in China are unqualified, and the phenomenon of some teachers getting angry at students when they cannot answer questions urgently needs improvement. 按照这一标准，他直言目前国内中小学教师「一大半不合格」，部分教师面对学生提问时因无法回答而迁怒学生的现象亟需改善。

Yu Minhong also reviewed New Oriental's structural changes in the "Internet + Education" era: the internet amplified the influence of star teachers, causing many excellent teachers to leave offline classrooms, including himself, who no longer teaches in classrooms. 俞敏洪还回顾新东方在「互联网 + 教育」时代的结构性变化：互联网放大名师影响力，使大量优秀教师离开线下课堂，包括他本人也不再走进教室授课。

He believes that the advent of AI will bring about a deeper industry reshaping, placing higher demands on teachers, and these demands are more difficult to meet than ever before. 他认为，AI 的到来将带来更深层次的行业重塑，对教师提出更高要求，而这些要求比以往更难达到。

He emphasized that the ultimate direction of artificial intelligence depends on the users, not the technology itself, and the education industry needs to redefine the role and value of teachers amidst technological changes. 他强调，人工智能的最终走向取决于使用者，而非技术本身，教育行业需要在技术变革中重新定义教师角色与价值。

item.title: OPPO 否认 Find X9 Ultra 网传渲染图
item.guid: OPPO-否认-Find-X9-Ultra-网传渲染图
item.description:
Recently, Zhou Yibao, product manager of the OPPO Find series, denied the rumored renders of the new phone when replying to netizens, explicitly stating, "Fake, you can wait for the official announcement later." He had previously started teasing the new phone in December last year, revealing its internal codename as "Lighthouse," implying that its imaging capabilities would become an industry benchmark. 近日，OPPO Find 系列产品负责人周意保在回复网友时否认网传新机渲染图，明确表示「假的，可以等后面官宣」。他此前已在去年 12 月开启新机预热，透露内部代号为「灯塔」，寓意影像能力将成为行业标杆。

According to multiple leaks from December last year, the Find X9 Ultra's imaging system adopts a "dual 200-megapixel" solution, including a 200-megapixel super large sensor main camera, a 200-megapixel periscope telephoto lens, and a 10X periscope ultra-telephoto lens. 从去年 12 月曝光的多方爆料来看，Find X9 Ultra 的影像系统采用「双 2 亿」方案，包括 2 亿超级大底主摄、2 亿潜望中长焦，并搭配 10X 潜望超长焦。

The leaks claim that this combination covers lossless high-quality focal lengths from main camera to mid-telephoto to super-telephoto, with native focal lengths extendable to 230mm, and high-quality focal lengths reaching 460mm, described as the "strongest camera phone king." 爆料称该组合覆盖主摄—中长焦—超长焦的无损高质量焦段，原生焦段可拓展至 230mm，高品质焦段可达 460mm，被形容为「最强机圈影帝」。

Furthermore, early engineering prototype test information indicates that the device may feature a 2K 2.5D large flat screen, a microcrystalline glass cover, a battery capacity exceeding 7000mAh, and is evaluated to support 100W wired charging and 50W wireless charging, while also equipped with 3D ultrasonic fingerprint recognition, IP68 / IP69 water resistance, and a large-sized motor, among other configurations. 此外，早期工程机测试信息显示，该机可能配备 2K 2.5D 大直屏、微晶玻璃盖板、电池容量超过 7000mAh，并评估支持 100W 有线充电与 50W 无线充电，同时具备 3D 超声波指纹、IP68 / IP69 防水等级以及大尺寸马达等配置。

item.title: 三星 Galaxy S26 系列配色与容量曝光
item.guid: 三星-Galaxy-S26-系列配色与容量曝光
item.description:
According to SamMobile, a Finnish retailer recently accidentally leaked the color options and storage specifications of the Samsung Galaxy S26 series, further confirming several previous rumors about the series. 据 SamMobile 报道，近日，芬兰零售商意外泄露了三星 Galaxy S26 系列的配色与存储规格，进一步印证了此前关于该系列产品的多项传闻。

The leaked information shows that the Galaxy S26 series will continue with three models: Standard, Plus, and Ultra. The previously rumored "S26 Edge" and "S26 Pro" did not appear. 泄露信息显示，Galaxy S26 系列将延续标准版、Plus 版与 Ultra 版三种型号，此前传闻中的「S26 Edge」与「S26 Pro」并未出现。

Unlike last year's Galaxy S25, which still offered 128GB starting storage in some markets, Samsung is expected to uniformly increase the starting capacity of the S26 series to 256GB in regions like Europe this year, aligning with previous configurations in markets such as China. 与去年 Galaxy S25 在部分市场仍提供 128GB 起步不同，今年三星预计将在欧洲等地区将 S26 系列的起步容量统一提升至 256GB，与中国等市场此前的配置保持一致 。

All three models will be available in four colors: Black, White, Sky Blue, and Cobalt Violet. SamMobile noted that some previously rumored colors, such as "Silver Shadow" silver and orange, did not appear in the Finnish retailer's list and might be region-exclusive. 三款机型均提供黑色、白色、天空蓝与钴紫四种配色。SamMobile 指出，部分此前传闻中的配色如「Silver Shadow」银色与橙色并未出现在芬兰零售商的列表中，可能属于地区限定款式 。

In addition to 256GB and 512GB, the Galaxy S26 Ultra will also offer a 1TB version, available in the same four colors: Black, White, Sky Blue, and Cobalt Violet. Galaxy S26 Ultra 除 256GB 与 512GB 外，还提供 1TB 版本，同样具备黑、白、天空蓝与钴紫四种配色。

Additionally, SamMobile reported that Samsung has not officially announced the release date for the Galaxy S26 series, but multiple sources suggest the new products are expected to debut on February 25 this year at the Unpacked event in San Francisco. 此外，SamMobile 报道提到，三星尚未正式公布 Galaxy S26 系列的发布时间，但多方消息称新品有望于今年 2 月 25 日在旧金山举行的 Unpacked 活动上亮相 。

item.title: 腾讯元宝春节分 10 亿现金，单个红包最高万元
item.guid: 腾讯元宝春节分-10-亿现金，单个红包最高万元
item.description:
Yesterday, Tencent officially released the "Notice on Distributing 1 Billion Yuan in Cash for Spring Festival," announcing that the Spring Festival event will officially begin on February 1. Users can log in to Tencent's AI product, Yuanbao App, to participate in sharing 1 billion yuan in cash red packets, with individual red packets potentially reaching up to 10,000 yuan. 昨天，腾讯官方发布《关于春节分 10 亿现金的通知》，宣布将在 2 月 1 日正式开启春节活动。用户登录腾讯旗下 AI 产品元宝 App 即可参与瓜分 10 亿现金红包，单个红包金额最高可达万元。

According to the event rules, reservations for the Yuanbao App main venue are now open. Users can click the reservation card on the homepage to enter the venue. 根据活动规则，元宝 App 主会场目前已开启预约，点击主页的预约卡片即可进入会场。

The prize pool for this event includes cash red packets, sharing red packets, and 100 limited "Cash Pony Cards" worth 10,000 yuan each. Users can not only claim daily cash red packets but also invite WeChat, QQ friends, and community friends to participate in opening red packets through sharing. 本次活动奖池涵盖现金红包、分享红包以及限量 100 张价值 1 万元的「现金小马卡」。用户不仅可以每日领取现金红包，还能通过分享红包邀请微信、QQ 好友及社群好友参与拆包。

According to Tencent insiders, behind the 1 billion yuan cash incentive, Yuanbao is brewing new product developments. In the officially released product interface diagram, a new entry named "Pie" has been added to the bottom Tab bar, which is currently in the internal testing invitation phase. 据腾讯内部人士透露，在 10 亿现金激励的背后，元宝正在酝酿新的产品动作。官方公布的产品界面图中，底部 Tab 栏已新增一个名为「派」的入口，目前正处于内测邀约阶段。

This also marks Tencent's return to investing 1 billion yuan in cash during the Spring Festival period after many years, following WeChat's distribution of 500 million red packets via "shake" during the 2015 Spring Festival Gala, which established its mobile payment dominance. 这也是继 2015 年春晚微信通过「摇一摇」发放 5 亿红包并确立移动支付地位后，腾讯时隔多年再次在春节档期投入 10 亿级现金。

item.title: 共享充电宝门店分成飙升至 30%，代理商涌向「移动机柜」模式
item.guid: 共享充电宝门店分成飙升至-30%，代理商涌向「移动机柜」模式
item.description:
According to LanJing News, several electric bicycles equipped with shared power bank devices from brands like Jiedian, Monster Charge, and Meituan have recently appeared on the streets of Shenzhen. These no longer rely on fixed store locations but operate by moving with pedestrian traffic. 据蓝鲸新闻报道，深圳街头近日出现多辆搭载街电、怪兽充电、美团等共享充电宝设备的电动自行车，它们不再依赖固定门店点位，而是随人流移动运营。

The report points out that behind this change is the continuous compression of profit margins for agents under the traditional store cooperation model. The store revenue share has risen from an early 20% to about 30%, further squeezing agent profits while platform commissions remain unchanged. 报道指出，这一变化背后是代理商在传统门店合作模式下利润空间被持续压缩，门店分成比例从早期约 20% 上涨至约 30%，在平台抽成不变的情况下进一步挤压代理商收益。

The core of the mobile operating model lies in "de-store-ization." Agents fix shared power bank cabinets in modified boxes at the rear of electric bicycles, forming mobile charging stations that can flexibly stop in high-traffic scenarios such as music festivals, camping areas, and subway entrances. 移动运营模式的核心在于「去门店化」。代理商将共享充电宝柜机固定在电动车尾部的改装箱内，形成可在音乐节、露营区、地铁口等高流动场景灵活停靠的流动充电站。

Compared to the traditional model, this method does not require revenue sharing with merchants; it only requires purchasing cabinets and electric bicycles to start operations, significantly reducing costs. 相比传统模式，该方式无需与商户分成，仅需采购柜机与电动车即可投入运营，成本显著降低。

Regarding equipment procurement, industry insiders revealed that shared power bank cabinets are usually purchased in batches of 30 or more, with the unit price decreasing as the purchase volume increases, ranging from 1230 yuan to about 1050 yuan. 在设备采购方面，业内人士透露，共享充电宝柜机通常以 30 台起购，单价随采购量增加而下降，从 1230 元至约 1050 元不等。

New models support "reverse charging" via power banks inside the cabinet, which can keep the equipment running for about 24 hours, further reducing operation and maintenance costs. Some agents even use second-hand electric bicycles or do not install batteries, only adding iron boxes to protect the cabinets, to reduce investment. 新机型支持通过柜内充电宝进行「反向充电」，可维持设备运行约 24 小时，进一步减少运维成本。部分代理商甚至使用二手电动车或不安装电瓶，仅加装铁箱保护柜机，以降低投入。

These mobile cabinets have been fully integrated into the shared service network by platforms, allowing users to return devices at any location, with the backend system automatically guiding them. This model is particularly popular in Guangdong, and similar operations have also appeared in Shanghai and other areas. 这些移动机柜已被平台完整接入共享服务网络，用户可在任意点位归还设备，后台系统会自动引导。该模式目前在广东地区尤为普及，上海等地也已出现类似运营。

Amidst the overall slowdown in industry growth and intensified competition for locations, various brands are seeking new growth through differentiated strategies. Monster Charge adopts a parallel model of direct operation and agency, Xiaodian Technology focuses on enclosed scenarios like shopping malls and cinemas, while Zhumang Technology relies on regional agency networks to penetrate county-level markets. 在行业整体增长放缓、点位竞争加剧的背景下，各品牌正通过差异化策略寻找增量。怪兽充电采用直营与代理并行模式，小电科技深耕商场、影院等封闭场景，竹芒科技则依托区域代理网络下沉县域市场。

Meituan, on the other hand, is attempting to deeply integrate shared power banks with its electric bicycle business, equipping new electric bicycles with two shared power banks and directly powering them using the vehicle's power source. This model is operated by electric bicycle agents, with all power bank revenue belonging to the agents, and Meituan not taking a commission. 美团则尝试将共享充电宝与其电单车业务深度融合，在新型电动车上搭载两个共享充电宝，并直接利用车辆电源供电。该模式由电单车代理商负责运营，充电宝收入全部归代理商所有，美团不参与抽成。

Industry insiders state that this "vehicle + power" model aims to increase the utilization rate of shared power banks while enhancing the operational activity of electric bicycles. It is considered a "demand folding" innovation, expected to further connect more local life service scenarios. 业内人士称，这一「车+电」模式旨在提升共享充电宝使用率，同时增强电单车运营活跃度，被视为一种「需求折叠」式创新，有望进一步连接更多本地生活服务场景。

item.title: 《潜水员戴夫》手游国服定档 2 月 6 日，首发 24 元
item.guid: 《潜水员戴夫》手游国服定档-2-月-6-日，首发-24-元
item.description:
The Chinese version of the mobile game "Dave the Diver" has been confirmed for official release on February 6 this year, with an initial price of 24 yuan (original price 30 yuan). Pre-orders are open on the Apple App Store, where the page indicates it will be available on February 7. 《潜水员戴夫》手游国服已确认将于今年 2 月 6 日正式发售，首发价为 24 元（原价 30 元），并在苹果 App Store 开启预约，页面显示将于 2 月 7 日上线。

The Chinese PC version will also simultaneously launch on the TapPC platform, with its original price consistent with Steam. It will offer a new global historical low 50% discount, bringing the price down to 40 yuan. This launch discount will cover the entire Spring Festival holiday, lasting until February 23. 国服 PC 版也将同步登陆 TapPC 平台，原价与 Steam 保持一致，并提供全球新史低五折优惠，折后价为 40 元，首发折扣将覆盖整个春节假期，持续至 2 月 23 日。

"Dave the Diver" mobile game is an original port from the PC version, adopting a buy-to-own model. It features multiple optimizations for mobile, including customizable button layouts, one-tap supply and crafting, Merman Village map teleportation, motion-controlled tea pouring and cooking, and horizontal/vertical screen switching. 《潜水员戴夫》手游为 PC 端的原版移植，采用买断制，并针对移动端进行了多项优化，包括可自定义按键布局、一键供应与制作、鲛人村地图传送、体感倒茶与做饭、横竖屏切换等功能。

Public information shows that "Dave the Diver" was developed by MINTROCKET, with XD Network responsible for its operation in China. The recommended graphics card for the PC version is GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon R9 270X. 公开资料显示，《潜水员戴夫》由 MINTROCKET 开发、心动网络负责国服运营，PC 端推荐显卡为 GTX 750 Ti 或 AMD Radeon R9 270X。

The game centers on exploration, collection, side quests, and RPG elements, while also incorporating management gameplay. Players can dive during the day, run a sushi restaurant at night, challenge deep-sea creatures by upgrading equipment, and explore ancient ruins. On Steam, over 140,000 players have given it an 'Overwhelmingly Positive' rating. 游戏以探索、收集、支线与 RPG 元素为核心，同时加入经营玩法，玩家可在白天潜水、夜间经营寿司店，并通过升级装备挑战深海生物、探索古代遗迹。Steam 端已有超过 14 万玩家给出「好评如潮」评价。

The game also includes various light gameplay modes, such as seahorse racing, virtual fish farming, whack-a-mole, and offers a pixel-style display of marine ecology. Previously, the mobile version underwent a Free Demo test, opening up the prologue and the first chapter of the main story. 游戏还包含多种轻量玩法，如赛海马、电子养鱼、打地鼠等，并提供像素风格的海洋生态展示。此前，手游版已进行 Free Demo 测试，开放序章与第一章主线体验。

item.title: 百度 App 启动马年春节红包活动，总额 5 亿今日上线
item.guid: 百度-App-启动马年春节红包活动，总额-5-亿今日上线
item.description:
Baidu App announced that it will launch its Year of the Horse Spring Festival Red Packet event starting today, with a total amount of 500 million yuan. The event will run until March 12. 百度 App 宣布，将于今天起启动马年春节红包活动，总金额达 5 亿元，活动将持续至 3 月 12 日。

Users can enter the main event venue by searching for 'Spring Festival Red Packet,' participate in multiple AI-powered interactive games, and have the chance to win cash prizes up to 10,000 yuan. 用户可通过搜索「春节红包」进入活动主会场，参与多项基于 AI 技术的互动玩法，并有机会获得最高 10000 元的现金奖励。

Baidu stated that this year's event revolves around the theme of 'Fantasy Life.' Baidu has launched nearly 200 AI special effect features within the app, allowing users to generate Year of the Horse-themed short films starring themselves with one click, and trigger interactive storylines in some of the effects. 百度表示，今年活动围绕「奇幻人生」主题展开，百度在 APP 内上线近 200 款 AI 特效玩法，用户可一键生成由自己主演的马年主题短片，并在部分特效中触发互动剧情。

Baidu AI also officially announced that it will appear as the chief AI partner at the 2026 Beijing Radio and Television Spring Festival Gala, held on February 17 this year. 百度 AI 还官宣，将作为首席 AI 合作伙伴亮相今年 2 月 17 日举办的 2026 北京广播电视台春节联欢晚会。

item.title: 《呼啸山庄》正片片段释出，3 月 13 日内地上映
item.guid: 《呼啸山庄》正片片段释出，3-月-13-日内地上映
item.description:
According to Watchmen Hollywood, a new clip from the new version of 'Wuthering Heights' was recently released, showcasing a dialogue scene between Catherine and Heathcliff. The clip was posted by the official account, and the film will be released in North America on February 13 and in mainland China on March 13. 据守望好莱坞消息，新版《呼啸山庄》近日释出一段正片片段，展示凯瑟琳与希斯克利夫之间的对话场景。该片段由官方账号发布，影片将于 2 月 13 日在北美上映、3 月 13 日登陆中国内地院线。

In the clip, Catherine and Heathcliff engage in a conversation about 'wealth' and 'marriage.' 片段中，凯瑟琳与希斯克利夫围绕「财富」「婚姻」展开对话。

Catherine mentions, 'Look at all this, he must be very rich. I suppose you're supposed to be in love with me, aren't you?' Heathcliff responds that if he were rich, he would 'do all the things rich people do, live in a big house, boss servants around, and marry a wife.' 凯瑟琳提到「看看这一切，他一定是真的非常富有，我想你理应是跟我相爱的吧？」希斯克利夫则回应，如果自己有钱，会「做所有有钱人会做的事情，住在大房子里，对佣人吆三喝四，娶个老婆」。

When Catherine presses, 'What kind of wife?', Heathcliff states that he has always favored the image of Rose from 'The Crown,' which displeases Catherine. 当凯瑟琳追问「什么老婆」时，希斯克利夫表示自己一直青睐《The Crown》中 Rose 的形象，引发凯瑟琳不满。

Judging by the performances and dialogue presented in the clip, there are some differences in character portrayal compared to the original novel, sparking discussion among some viewers in the comments section, including adaptations of Catherine's image, dialogue style, and actor interpretations. 从片段呈现的表演与台词来看，影片在角色塑造上与原著存在一定差异，引发部分观众在评论区讨论，包括对凯瑟琳形象的改编、对白风格以及演员诠释方式等。

item.title: 《宇宙巨人：希曼崛起》发布首支预告
item.guid: 《宇宙巨人：希曼崛起》发布首支预告
item.description:
Sony Pictures recently released the global premiere trailer for the action sci-fi adventure film 'Masters of the Universe: He-Man Rising,' along with its first poster. 索尼影业近日发布动作科幻冒险电影《宇宙巨人：希曼崛起》的全球首支预告，并同步释出首款海报。

The trailer opens with grand shots showcasing the ancient wars and mythical background of the otherworldly Eternia, then shifts to Earth, telling how Adam, played by Galitzine, awakens to his identity as an otherworldly prince summoned by a mysterious holy sword. 预告片以宏大镜头展现异世界埃坦尼亚的古老战争与神话背景，随后转至地球，讲述加利齐纳饰演的亚当因神秘圣剑召唤而觉醒异世界王子身份。

With the power dormant for fifteen years now returned, he must return to Eternia under the threat of Skeletor, shout the classic incantation 'By the Power of Grayskull!', and transform into the legendary hero He-Man. 尘封十五年的力量重新回归，他必须在骷髅王威胁下重返埃坦尼亚，喊出经典咒语「赐予我力量吧！」，化身传奇英雄希曼。

The film is positioned as a comprehensive upgrade to the classic 80s animated series 'He-Man and the Masters of the Universe.' Knight combines sci-fi action experience with character development, attempting to create a 'renaissance-style' reboot for a global audience. 影片定位为对 80 年代经典动画《宇宙的巨人希曼》的全面升级，奈特将科幻动作经验与角色塑造结合，试图打造一次面向全球观众的「文艺复兴式」重启。

The film will first be released in the United States on June 5 this year, followed by a gradual rollout to cinemas worldwide. 影片将于今年 6 月 5 日在美国率先上映，随后陆续登陆全球院线。

item.title: 《没问题》定档 1 月 31 日
item.guid: 《没问题》定档-1-月-31-日
item.description:
The film 'No Problem' announced its nationwide release on January 31 this year, simultaneously unveiling its trailer and poster. Produced by Liang Jing, written and directed by Jiang Jiachen, and starring Liang Long, Fan Shuaiqi, and Xu Jie'er, the film presents a black comedy with a strong Northeastern narrative style. 电影《没问题》宣布将于今年 1 月 31 日在全国上映，并同步发布预告与海报。影片由梁静监制，蒋佳辰编剧并执导，梁龙、范帅琦、徐洁儿领衔主演，以浓厚的东北叙事风格呈现一部灰色幽默喜剧。

The film revolves around Zuo Shouquan (played by Liang Long), the director of the Morning Post editorial department. To prevent his daughter from continuing to play rock music and to resolve conflicts between his daughter and her English teacher, he spares no effort, using personal connections, arranging dinner parties, and even 'sacrificing' himself. 影片围绕晨报编辑部主任左守权（梁龙 饰）展开，他为阻止女儿继续玩摇滚、化解女儿与英语老师的矛盾，不惜动用人情、摆下饭局，甚至「牺牲」自我。

Beneath its lighthearted exterior, the story explores father-daughter relationships, family misunderstandings, and the real-life situations of middle-aged individuals, conveying the emotional core of 'loving life even after recognizing its truths.' 故事在轻松外壳下探讨父女关系、家庭误解与中年群体的现实处境，传递「认清生活真相后依然热爱生活」的情感内核。
